==Motivation==
you want to only keep the mutations having a DEPTH greater than a given value
==Solution==
Create a Java Snpippet Row Filter
{{{
for(String s:$INFO$.split("[;]"))
  {
  if(!s.startsWith("DP=")) continue;
  s=s.substring(3);
  int depth=Integer.parseInt(s);
  return depth>4;
  }
System.err.println("Cannot find Depth in "+ $INFO$ );
return true;
}}}
